alert.note: Alert for Clay; Hamilton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:41PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clay and southern Hamilton Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 941 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trumbull, or 10 miles northeast of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harvard around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Saronville, Sutton and Stockham. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 335 and 340. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
